m_szDocTitle: Patent US20130344401 - Metal/Air Battery with Electrochemical Oxygen Compression - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Abstract A metal/air battery in one embodiment includes a negative electrode, a positive electrode, and a separator positioned between the negative electrode and the positive electrode, wherein the pressure within the positive electrode is maintained at or above 10 bar with compression energy provided by electrons driving electrochemical reaction in the battery during charging of the metal/air battery.
